org.embulk.util.retryhelper.jetty92

Class Jetty92SingleRequester

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.embulk.util.retryhelper.jetty92.Jetty92SingleRequester

  • public abstract class Jetty92SingleRequester
extends Object
    Jetty92SingleRequester is to define a single request to the target REST service to be ready for retries. It is expected to use with Jetty92RetryHelper as follows. 
    
 InputStream inputStream = jetty92RetryHelper.requestWithRetry(
     new InputStreamJetty92ResponseEntityReader(),
     new Jetty92SingleRequester() {
         public void requestOnce(org.eclipse.jetty.client.HttpClient client,
                                 org.eclipse.jetty.client.api.Response.Listener listener)
         {
             client.newRequest("https://example.com/api/resource").method(HttpMethod.GET).send(listener);
         }

         public boolean isResponseStatusToRetry(org.eclipse.jetty.client.api.Response response)
         {
             return (response.getStatus() / 100) == 4;
         }
     });
    See Also:
    Jetty92ResponseReader, InputStreamJetty92ResponseEntityReader

    • Method Detail

      • requestOnce

        public abstract void requestOnce(org.eclipse.jetty.client.HttpClient client,
                                 org.eclipse.jetty.client.api.Response.Listener responseListener)
        Requests to the target service with the given org.eclipse.jetty.client.HttpClient. The response is provided to the specified org.eclipse.jetty.client.api.Response.Listener by Jetty. The method is abstract that must be overridden.

      • toRetry

        public final boolean toRetry(Exception exception)
        Returns true if the given Exception from Jetty92RetryHelper is to retry. This method cannot be overridden. Override isResponseStatusRetryable and isExceptionRetryable instead. isResponseStatusRetryable is called for org.eclipse.jetty.client.HttpResponseException. isExceptionRetryable is called for other exceptions.

      • isResponseStatusToRetry

        protected abstract boolean isResponseStatusToRetry(org.eclipse.jetty.client.api.Response response)
        Returns true if the given org.eclipse.jetty.client.api.Response is to retry. This method is abstract to be overridden, and protected to be called from isRetryable.

      • isExceptionToRetry

        protected boolean isExceptionToRetry(Exception exception)
        Returns true if the given Exception is to retry. This method available to override, and protected to be called from isRetryable.
